start_message: Welcome to the Time Capsule Bot! Use the buttons below to navigate.
help_message:
Here are the available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/create_capsule - Create a new capsule
/add_recipient - Add a recipient to a capsule
/view_capsules - View your capsules
/send_capsule - Send a capsule
/delete_capsule - Delete a capsule
/edit_capsule - Edit a capsule
/view_recipients - View recipients of a capsule
/support_author - Support the author
/change_language - Change language
